Text: The corrosive oil coating {attacker.aliaspossessive} {!weapon} weakens {defender.aliaspossessive} clothing.
Using the heavy counterweight, {instigator} manages to recover quickly.
{defender} is poisoned by the venom coating {attacker.aliaspossessive} {!weapon}.
{attacker.aliaspossessive} magical necklace soothes {attacker.possessive} throat, to help make room for the next meal.
{attacker.aliaspossessive} fanged mask frightens {attacker.possessive} prey into submission.
{attacker.aliaspossessive} slick oil coating makes {attacker.object} hard to grab a hold of!
An eerie glow of {attacker.aliaspossessive} wristband captures {defender.aliaspossessive} attention, lowering {defender.possessive} guard.
